comments.raw_text:
There is apparently no API for asking where the cursor is in a multiline text input-- in particular, what line it's in. The web console would benefit from having this information so that it can respond differently to the up arrow depending on what line the cursor is on.

This would benefit both XUL textbox and content textarea (and input type="text"?).

Dave
